pa:
♪ To be sure ♪
 ♪ To be right ♪

 Most people think you can only declare love with flowers and chocolate,

Các người làm gì vậy?

- You're a cop! -Keep it up. Come on.
 You should be ashamed of yourself!

pa: Well, we could also use real C-4.

pa: -We can place it anywhere you'd imagine. -Boom!

Bùm!

 -I'll decide if I answer them.

 Tôi sẽ quyết định.

 Mama?

Right?

Sao cô làm được?

and as I was getting up, I almost broke the window off the wall
